org.archive.crawler.settings

类 CrawlSettingsSAXSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.xml.transform.sax.SAXSource
      • org.archive.crawler.settings.CrawlSettingsSAXSource
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javax.xml.transform.Source, org.xml.sax.XMLReader

    public class CrawlSettingsSAXSource
extends javax.xml.transform.sax.SAXSource
implements org.xml.sax.XMLReader
    Class that takes a CrawlerSettings object and create SAXEvents from it. This is a helper class for XMLSettingsHandler.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 javax.xml.transform.sax.SAXSource
